content: ऊर्मिः {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [ऋ-मि अर्तेरुच्च <ls>Uṇ. 4. 44</ls>] {@--1@} A wave, billow; पयो वेत्रवत्याश्चलोर्मि <ls>Me. 24</ls>; <ls>R. 5. 61</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 85.</ls> {@--2@} Current, flow. {@--3@} Light. {@--4@} Speed, velocity. {@--5@} A fold or plait in a garment. {@--6@} A row, line. {@--7@} A human infirmity (Wilson); शोकमोहौ जरामृत्यू क्षुत्पिपासे षडूर्मयः. {@--8@} Distress, uneasiness, anxiety. {@--9@} The course of a horse. {@--10@} Missing, regretting. {@--11@} Association, number, quantity.
